description: This version of the  Person Playing Handball emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person playing handball emoji, depicted with a dark skin tone, radiates energetic athleticism through its poised stance and focused expression. Apple's signature soft rounded edges and precise shading give the ball and the player's form a tactile quality. This emoji is perfect for expressing participation in sports, teamwork, or a moment of intense physical exertion and competitive spirit.
